IMU North River Terrace

New in 2015, the North River Terrace at the Iowa Memorial Union is a beautiful 6,000 square foot space overlooking the Iowa River and IMU Amphitheater. 

It offers picturesque views of the university's art buildings, Danforth Chapel, Hancher Auditorium, and the IATL Building. 

The North River Terrace is available for private events and is included in the Main Lounge rental fee.

Features & Location

Venue is outdoors

Best for:

Ceremony

Cocktail hour

Extras :

Rental fee includes two outdoor spaces, the IMU Sun Porch and the IMU North River Terrace

Best for:

Ceremonies, Cocktail Hours

Located near: Iowa Memorial Union
